views.markdown: If you need help with "Shadow", you can contact jjolano, the developer, via e-mail.
jjolano is the maintainer of the package "Shadow". Please contact them via email for any questions on this version of the package.
If you found a mistake in the depiction or cannot download the package, you can reach out to the maintainer of the "jjolano's iOS Tweaks" repo, jjolano.
